description.zh-cn: 三国时期曹魏后期名将。因建立灭蜀奇功，官至太尉。后遭钟会、卫瓘诬陷谋反而被杀。
description.en: A prominent military general of the state of Cao Wei during the Three Kingdoms period. He reached the rank of Grand Marshal for his decisive role in the conquest of Shu Han. He was later falsely accused of rebellion by Zhong Hui and Wei Guan and killed.

description.zh-cn: 中国三国时期的一个政权。
description.en: A state during the Three Kingdoms period of China.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏权臣，西晋的奠基者。
description.en: A powerful official of Cao Wei and the founder of the Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国三国时期的一个政权。
description.en: A state during the Three Kingdoms period of China.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉后期的重要将领。
description.en: A prominent general of Shu Han in its late period.

description.zh-cn: 263年曹魏攻灭蜀汉的战争。
description.en: The war in 263 where the state of Cao Wei conquered the state of Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉的第二位亦是末代皇帝。
description.en: The second and last emperor of the state of Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏后期重要将领。
description.en: A prominent general of Cao Wei in its late period.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏及西晋时期官员。
description.en: An official who served in Cao Wei and the Western Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏将领。
description.en: A military general of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾之子，随父一同被杀。
description.en: Son of Deng Ai, executed along with his father.

description.zh-cn: 264年钟会在蜀地发动的叛乱，最终失败被杀。
description.en: A rebellion launched by Zhong Hui in the former Shu territory in 264, which ultimately failed and led to his death.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏权臣，西晋的奠基者之一。
description.en: A powerful official of Cao Wei and one of the founders of the Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾之孙。在邓艾家族被平反后，被晋武帝任命为郎中。
description.en: Grandson of Deng Ai. After his family's name was cleared, he was appointed as a Gentleman of the Interior by Emperor Wu of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 西晋开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Western Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西晋议郎。曾上疏晋武帝为邓艾鸣冤。
description.en: A Consultant of the Western Jin dynasty. He submitted a memorial to Emperor Wu of Jin to plead for Deng Ai's innocence.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏及西晋时期将领。曾奉命考察邓艾在陇右的民望。
description.en: A general who served in Cao Wei and the Western Jin dynasty. He was ordered to inspect Deng Ai's reputation in the Longyou region.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代地名，位于今河南新野。
description.en: An ancient Chinese place name, located in modern-day Xinye, Henan.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏后期将领。
description.en: A general of Cao Wei in its late period.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏权臣，西晋的奠基者之一。
description.en: A powerful official of Cao Wei and one of the founders of the Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉官员，诸葛亮之子。
description.en: An official of Shu Han and the son of Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾的籍贯为义阳棘阳。
description.en: Deng Ai's ancestral home was Jiyang, Yiyang Commandery.

position.en: Grand Marshal, General Who Conquers the West, etc.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾是曹魏后期的重要将领和官员。
description.en: Deng Ai was a prominent general and official in the late period of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 司马懿赏识邓艾的才能，将其辟为太尉府掾属，并升任尚书郎。
description.en: Sima Yi appreciated Deng Ai's talent, appointing him as an aide in the Grand Marshal's office and promoting him to Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾多年在曹魏西线防御并进攻蜀汉，最终率军灭蜀。
description.en: For many years, Deng Ai defended against and attacked Shu Han on Cao Wei's western front, eventually leading the army that conquered Shu.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾与姜维是长期的军事对手，在多次战役中交锋。
description.en: Deng Ai and Jiang Wei were long-term military adversaries who clashed in multiple battles.

description.zh-cn: 作为曹魏的实际掌权者，司马昭策划并发动了灭蜀之战。
description.en: As the de facto ruler of Cao Wei, Sima Zhao planned and launched the campaign to conquer Shu.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾作为伐蜀主将之一，率军偷渡阴平，是灭蜀的关键。
description.en: As one of the main commanders of the Shu invasion, Deng Ai's infiltration via Yinping was the key to the conquest.

description.zh-cn: 此战导致蜀汉灭亡。
description.en: This war led to the fall of the state of Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾率军奇袭成都，逼使蜀汉皇帝刘禅投降。
description.en: Deng Ai led a surprise attack on Chengdu, forcing the Shu Han emperor Liu Shan to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 在绵竹之战中，邓艾击败并导致诸葛瞻战死。
description.en: In the Battle of Mianzhu, Deng Ai defeated and caused the death of Zhuge Zhan.

description.zh-cn: 钟会与邓艾向来不睦，在灭蜀后诬陷邓艾谋反，导致其被收捕。
description.en: Zhong Hui, who had a poor relationship with Deng Ai, falsely accused him of rebellion after the conquest of Shu, leading to his arrest.

description.zh-cn: 卫瓘联合钟会诬陷邓艾，并在钟会死后，为求自保派田续追杀邓艾父子。
description.en: Wei Guan colluded with Zhong Hui to frame Deng Ai, and after Zhong Hui's death, he sent Tian Xu to kill Deng Ai and his son to protect himself.

description.zh-cn: 司马昭因对邓艾居功自傲产生疑忌，听信钟会诬告后下令收捕邓艾。
description.en: Sima Zhao became suspicious of Deng Ai's arrogance and, believing Zhong Hui's accusations, ordered Deng Ai's arrest.

description.zh-cn: 田续奉卫瓘之命，于绵阳西将邓艾杀害。
description.en: Under Wei Guan's orders, Tian Xu killed Deng Ai west of Mianyang.

description.zh-cn: 田续奉卫瓘之命，将邓忠与其父邓艾一同杀害。
description.en: Under Wei Guan's orders, Tian Xu killed Deng Zhong along with his father Deng Ai.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾的死是钟会之乱所引发的权力斗争的直接后果之一。
description.en: Deng Ai's death was one of the direct consequences of the power struggle triggered by Zhong Hui's rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 钟会在其发动的叛乱中被部下所杀。
description.en: Zhong Hui was killed by his own subordinates during the rebellion he initiated.

description.zh-cn: 邓忠是邓艾的儿子。
description.en: Deng Zhong was the son of Deng Ai.

description.zh-cn: 邓朗是邓艾的孙子。
description.en: Deng Lang was the grandson of Deng Ai.

description.zh-cn: 田续奉卫瓘之命杀害邓艾。
description.en: Tian Xu killed Deng Ai under the orders of Wei Guan.

description.zh-cn: 晋武帝追念邓艾功绩，下诏赦免其孙邓朗，并任命他为郎中，为邓艾家族平反。
description.en: Emperor Wu of Jin, commemorating Deng Ai's achievements, pardoned his grandson Deng Lang, appointed him as a Gentleman of the Interior, and rehabilitated the Deng family.

description.zh-cn: 段灼向晋武帝上疏为邓艾鸣冤，称其“心怀至忠”，促进了邓艾的平反。
description.en: Duan Zhuo submitted a memorial to Emperor Wu of Jin to plead for Deng Ai's innocence, stating he was 'utterly loyal,' which contributed to his rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 唐彬在伐蜀前向司马昭报告称邓艾在陇右大失人心，此举可能加深了司马昭对邓艾的猜忌。
description.en: Before the conquest of Shu, Tang Bin reported to Sima Zhao that Deng Ai was very unpopular in the Longyou region, an act that likely deepened Sima Zhao's suspicion of Deng Ai.

description.zh-cn: 在狄道之战中，邓艾与陈泰的军队会合，共同抗击蜀军。
description.en: During the Battle of Didao, Deng Ai's army rendezvoused with Chen Tai's to jointly resist the Shu forces.

description.zh-cn: 在司马师掌权期间，邓艾担任汝南太守、兖州刺史等职。
description.en: During Sima Shi's regency, Deng Ai served as the Administrator of Runan, Inspector of Yan Province, and other positions.

description.zh-cn: 在司马昭掌权期间，邓艾受其提拔和重用，多次领兵作战。
description.en: During Sima Zhao's regency, Deng Ai was promoted and heavily relied upon, leading troops in battle on multiple occasions.
